div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1500 Beirut (anc. Berytus) environs, Phoe- nicia, 1966 Burial: c. 332 B.C. Contents: 27 AR, 6 AE Sicyon: 1 AR fr. Cyzicus: 2 AR fr. Erythrae: 1 AR. fr. Miletus: 1 AR fr. Samos: 1 AR fr. Citium: 1 AR fr. Aradus: 2 AR fr. Byblus: 5 AR fr. Sidon: 7 AR fr. Tyre: 6 AR fr.; 6 AE Disposition: Private coll. Sheridan, Num. Aug. 1971, pp. 1127-33, illus.
